ygData.subject: Re: Our class
ygData.msgSnippet: Our spells sky rocket as far as damage goes around level 20, but until then, we re equal to the magician, and without any pets.  just tough it out, its not so
ygData.messageBody:
Our spells sky rocket as far as damage goes around level 20, but until then,
we're equal to the magician, and without any pets. just tough it out, its
not so bad, we'll kick butt eventually!!
Raista, high elf, rallos zek


----- Original Message -----
From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 12:52 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Our class


> From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
> Just wondering how other people feel about our Wizard class. It seems to
me
> that we are short-changed compared to magicians and necromancers, whose
> spells seem a lot better, and can have "pets" fight for them. It's also
> hard to make signifant amounts of money to buy spells. I still like the
> game, just wondered if anyone else felt the same way.
>
> Greg (Kronan)
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Has ONElist changed your life?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> Visit our homepage and share with us your experiences at ONElist of the
Week!
